room_title: Escape room "The Cure" by Exodus Escape Adventures in Sacramento
room_description:
Escape with the cure!  The fate of all of known civilization rest upon your shoulders-no pressure!  A deadly pathogen has plagued humanity and now you are our last hope!

Discover the cure to remove the devastating affects of this afflicting mankind.  In one hour it will be too late for you and everyone else. Escape with the cure and save the future!
